sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' const UserInput = () => { const [userInput, setUserInput] = useState({ "current-savings" : "", 'yearly-contribution' : "", "expected-return" : "", duration: "", }) const onSubmitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); } const onResetHandler = () =>{ } const inputChangeHandler = (event) =>{ setUserInput({...userInput, [event.target.name] : event.target.value}) } return (

inputChangeHandler('current-savings', event.target.value )} type="number" id="current-savings" />

inputChangeHandler('yearly-contribution', event.target.value )} type="number" id="yearly-contribution" />

inputChangeHandler('expected-return', event.target.value )}/>

inputChangeHandler('duration', event.target.value )} />

) } export default UserInput
